name: Autogun Heroes: Supercharged
storyline:
Aliens have taken over the galaxy and it is your mission to take it back with the help of Gus and his fellow heroes! Autogun Heroes: Supercharged, is a thrilling shoot 'em up that delivers skill-based 2D action platforming with tight, responsive controls. Assemble your heroes, each wielding distinct abilities, and reclaim your home one battle at a time!

Assemble your team from a diverse roster of heroes, each with unique abilities, ranging from increased fire rates to jetpacks. Try different heroes and choose your favorite strategically to match your own playstyle. To complement your heroes' strengths and cover their weaknesses, you can further optimize their performance with weapons, gadgets, and armor to customize stats like damage, fire rate, and defense to adapt to the relentless challenges of the alien-infected galaxy.

Choose weapons, gadgets, and armor that enhance each character’s unique stats, to maximize their potential against the aliens. The best loadouts depend on how you play—experiment to find the ideal combination that complements your strategy and adapts seamlessly to the challenges ahead.
summary: Blast through alien-infested planets and help Gus assemble a team of powerful heroes to save the galaxy. This challenging shoot 'em up 2D action platformer combines brutal chaos with smooth, responsive controls. Dodge. Roll. Dominate!
